description: A virtual audio device working as virtual audio cable. All audio coming in the CABLE input is simply forwarded to the CABLE output.

script: if (-not (is_admin)) { abort 'This package requires admin privileges to install' }
info 'This package requires restart to complete the installation.'
if (-not (is_admin)) { abort 'This package requires admin privileges to uninstall' }
info 'This package requires restart to complete the uninstallation.'
if (-not (is_admin)) { abort 'This package requires admin privileges to install' }
info 'This package requires restart to complete the installation.'
if (-not (is_admin)) { abort 'This package requires admin privileges to uninstall' }
info 'This package requires restart to complete the uninstallation.'
